original_text: But some seeds fell on good soil and strong plants grew from those seeds. Some plants made 100 new seeds. Some plants made 60 new seeds and some plants made 30 new seeds.’
korean_text: 더러는 좋은 땅에 떨어지매 어떤 것은 백 배, 어떤 것은 육십 배, 어떤 것은 삼십 배의 결실을 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: But some seeds fell on good soil
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 어떤 씨들은 좋은 땅에 떨어졌고

sentences.original_text: and strong plants grew from those seeds
and some plants made 30 new seeds
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 어떤 식물들은 30개의 새 씨를 맺었습니다
